data.title: Fermi Prize: J. Robert Oppenheimer Named to Receive Annual AEC Award
data.meta_description: The White House announced last week that J. Robert Oppenheimer would be the recipient of the Atomic Energy Commission's 1963 Fermi prize. The prize, which is accompanied by a $50,000 award, is given for "especially meritorious contribution to the development, use or control of atomic energy," and, a …
